inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top AzureActiveDirectory operations 
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| summarize count() by Operation 
| order by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//AzureActiveDirectory operations over time
OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d)
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| summarize Current_Week = countif(TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)), Previous_Week = countif(TimeGenerated < ago(7d)) by Operation
| extend Per = iff(Current_Week > Previous_Week, toreal(Current_Week) / Previous_Week, toreal(Previous_Week) / Current_Week)
| extend sign = iff(Current_Week > Previous_Week, '+', '-')
| extend Percentage = iff(Current_Week != 0 and Previous_Week != 0 and Previous_Week != Current_Week, strcat(sign, extract(@'(\d*(\.\d{1,2}|$))',Â 1, tostring((Per -1 )*100)), '%'), 'No Percentage - 0')
| project Operation, Previous_Week, Current_Week, Percentage

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//AzureActiveDirectory operations over time
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| summarize Events = count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//AzureActiveDirectory operations over time
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| summarize Number = count() by UserId
| top 10 by Number
| project User_ID =  UserId, Number

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| summarize additions = countif(Operation contains 'add'), updates = countif(Operation contains 'Update'), deletions = countif(Operation contains 'Delete') by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity  
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| where Operation contains 'add' 
| summarize count() by Operation, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity  
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| where Operation contains 'update' 
| summarize count() by Operation, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity  
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| where Operation contains 'delete' 
| summarize count() by Operation, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Activity by User type 
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| summarize count() by UserType

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity  
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| where Operation contains 'user' 
| summarize count() by Operation

content.Query:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation contains 'user' and Operation != 'UserLoggedIn'
| summarize count() by Operation

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation contains 'user' and Operation != 'UserLoggedIn'
| top 10 by TimeGenerated desc
| project Operation, UserId , ResultStatus

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation == 'Add user.'
| project TimeGenerated, User_Name=todynamic(AADTarget)[0].ID
| summarize by tostring(User_Name), TimeGenerated
| limit 10

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation == 'UserLoggedIn'
| summarize Logons = count() by ResultStatus, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity  
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| where Operation contains 'group' 
| summarize count() by Operation

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation contains 'group'
| top 10 by TimeGenerated desc
| project Operation, UserId , ResultStatus

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation == 'Add group.'
| project Group_Name=todynamic(AADTarget)[0].ID, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated
| limit 10

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Failed operations by operation
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where ResultStatus == 'Failure'
| summarize count() by Operation, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
